# Vaultaire Website

> Vaultaire is a local-first encrypted vault for iOS.
> This website contains product documentation, legal pages, invite fallback UX, and detailed competitor comparisons.

## Documentation

- [Home](https://vaultaire.app/): Product overview, feature sections, and security summary.
- [Manifesto](https://vaultaire.app/manifesto/): Core privacy philosophy and positioning.
- [Privacy Policy](https://vaultaire.app/privacy/): Data handling and third-party service policies.
- [Terms of Use](https://vaultaire.app/terms/): Terms and legal agreements.

## Features

- [Features Hub](https://vaultaire.app/features/): All security and privacy features.
- [Pattern Encryption](https://vaultaire.app/features/pattern-encryption/): How pattern-based encryption works.
- [Secret Phrase](https://vaultaire.app/features/secret-phrase/): Recovery phrase system for vault access.
- [Plausible Deniability](https://vaultaire.app/features/plausible-deniability/): Hidden vaults with decoy patterns.
- [Hidden Vaults](https://vaultaire.app/features/hidden-vaults/): Multiple vaults per device.
- [Duress Mode](https://vaultaire.app/features/duress-mode/): Emergency vault destruction.
- [Encrypted iCloud Backup](https://vaultaire.app/features/encrypted-icloud-backup/): Encrypted off-site backup.
- [Secure Sharing](https://vaultaire.app/features/secure-sharing/): Share vaults with controlled access.
- [Security Architecture](https://vaultaire.app/features/security-features/): Technical encryption stack.
- [Ease of Use](https://vaultaire.app/features/ease-of-use/): User experience design.

## Product Navigation

- [Compare Hub](https://vaultaire.app/compare/): Directory of app-to-app comparisons.
- [Vault Invite Fallback](https://vaultaire.app/s/): Deep-link fallback page for shared vault invites.

## Discovery

- [Sitemap](https://vaultaire.app/sitemap.xml): Canonical page inventory with freshness dates.
- [RSS Feed](https://vaultaire.app/feed.xml): Machine-readable update feed.
- [MCP Manifest](https://vaultaire.app/.well-known/mcp.json): MCP discovery metadata.

## Optional

- [App Store Listing](https://apps.apple.com/app/vaultaire/id6758529311): Install Vaultaire on iPhone.
